allowedChars: list of permitted characters in the password
minimumLength: int of the minimum length of the password
maximumLength: int of the maximum length of the password
minimumByteLength: int of the minimum byte length of the password
maximumByteLength: int of the maximum byte length of the password
exactLength: int of the exact length of the password
containSpecial: a list of characters recognized as special characters
containTypes: int of the minimum number of types needed
a list of characters recognized as special characters
bannedPasswords: list of passwords not permitted to be used (case insensitive)
bannedCaseSensitivePasswords: list of passwords not permitted to be used (must match case)
bannedWords: list of words that cannot be contained by the password (case insensitive)
bannedCaseSensitiveWords: list of words that cannot be contained by the password (must match case)
bannedChar: list of char that can't appear in the password
bannedStartChar: char that cannot be the first character of the password
bannedEndChar: char that cannot be the last character of the password
noRepeated: int representing the minimum number of repeated characters that is not allowed
notBadPassword: this rule matches your password with a list of known bad passwords from an API
noDictWords: int representing the minimum length of words in a dictionary API that can be matched
